name: Relax Memory Game
description:
Try to relax in an exciting and atmospheric game where you not only relax, but also develop your memory and attentiveness. Embark on a calming adventure with more than 30 levels.

Relax Memory Game-find a pair Game, more than 30 levels, with a choice of difficulty, a time limit that is added by guessing pairs and a limited number. The game develops your memory and attentiveness.

Feature of game:
- More than 30 levels
- memory training
- Relaxing atmosphere
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
